page.title: 08ICKFORD FESTIVAL
page.content:
On the 13th of July 1985 it is Ickford village festival and it is going to be opened by the newspaper page 3 girl of the year Samantha Fox who is a model. She is famous for taking her clothes off and having her picture taken. It is also going to be the official opening of the playing area. The playing area has got a swing, climbing frame,a sandpit and a football pitch. There is also going to be a fun run, a pram race and a ladies v Ickford football team football match and lots of other attractions.
BY LYN COCKSHOTT
